ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Provides the biggest amount of statistical measures in the whole R world. Includes measures of regression, (multiclass) classification and multilabel classification. The measures come mainly from the 'mlr' package and were programed by several 'mlr' developers.

Provides the biggest amount of statistical measures in the whole R world. Includes measures of regression, (multiclass) classification and multilabel classification. The measures come mainly from the 'mlr' package and were programed by several 'mlr' developers.

name: r-measures
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.3' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-measures
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/measures_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/measures/measures_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 5439453187648d98935d75daaa9f65ff5706b3993050c790c0d0a5c72c84450c

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('measures')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('measures')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=measures
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Provides the biggest amount of statistical measures in the whole R world. Includes
    measures of regression, (multiclass) classification and multilabel classification.
    The measures come mainly from the 'mlr' package and were programed by several 'mlr'
    developers.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
